name: Mango, Orange and Ginger Smoothie
description: Ginger combines very well with mango and contributes a host of antioxidant and anti-inflammatory phytochemicals.
recipeYield: One large serving or two small servings
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, for one, quick, weekday
keywords: dessert, ginger, mango, orange juice, gluten-free, healthy, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Optional: 1/2 ripe banana (about 2 ounces peeled banana)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the orange juice, mango, ginger juice and ice cubes in a blender. Blend until frothy and smooth. If you want a thicker drink, add the banana. Serve right away for the best flavor.
